reference.shortdesc: An appendix indicates a topic or map as an appendix within a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The appendix element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample creates appendix topics that include subtopics:<appendix href="intro.dita"> <topicref href="caring.dita"/> <topicref href="feeding.dita"/> </appendix> <appendix href="setup.dita"> <topicref href="prereq.dita"/> <topicref href="download.dita"/> </appendix>
The following code sample creates an appendix by referencing a DITA map of content:<appendix href="intro.ditamap" format="ditamap"/>
